overview: In a twist of fate, and the journey of a lifetime, our trunked hero discovers the true meaning of art in the greatest music competition of all time: Le Epic Facter  Featuring original songs from Leona Lewis, Main Character, Sandra Bollick, Red_Truck_01 and Seafood Diet.  Strap in, because this is a ride you will never forget.

production_companies.name: Marge Bouvier x Our Clap Productions

title: Le Epic Facter
